name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How To Run OmeTV on PC

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you want to use OmeTV on your pc and windows or Mac ? Install now the extension and start editing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you want to use OmeTV on your pc? So, You are in the right place, Just install this extension and start using.

How to use this extension?

1. First, install this chrome extension.
2. Click on the extension icon.
3. After that,  You can know how to run this app on your pc.
4. Enjoy!
